summary: An email exchange between FBI agents discussing scheduling assistance for proffer sessions on Monday regarding inmates and guards at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) allowing contraband into the facility as it pertains to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The sender of the email, identified as an FBI Special Agent from the NY Violent Crimes Task Force, Squad C-19, offering to help with proffer sessions.

events.title: Scheduled Proffer Sessions
events.description: Proffer sessions scheduled for 10:00 AM, 12:00 PM, and 2:30 PM at the Southern District of New York (SDNY) regarding inmates and guards at MCC allowing contraband into the facility as it pertains to Epstein.

keyFacts: The email discusses scheduling proffer sessions related to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
The proffers concern inmates and guards at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) allowing contraband into the facility.
The sessions were scheduled for Monday (likely August 26, 2019, given the email date of August 23, 2019) at the Southern District of New York.
An FBI Special Agent from the NY Violent Crimes Task Force, Squad C-19, offered to assist with the proffers.
